name: Auto Populate Country/State/City/Ward DropDown Addon for Gravity Forms
author: GravityExtra

sections.description:
AUTO POPULATE COUNTRY/STATE/CITY/WARD GRAVITYFORMS ADDON

  • If you are looking for an easy and efficient way for your user to select country/state/city/ward from all over the world with auto populate dropdown, you’re going to want this add-on!
  • Allow you to add a new field for auto populating country/state/city/ward easily.

Free Features:

  • Allow user to select a custom field for Auto Populate Country/State/City/Ward dropdown.
  • Allow user to select default country.

Link Demo: Free version

Premium Features (PRO Version):

  • Allow user to select only one single country.
  • Detect user’s IP to display selected user’s country by default.
  • Allow user to select pre-defined multiple countries.
  • Allow user to add/edit/delete values for Country/State/City/Ward.
  • Allow user to enable custom input for each of the field if data is not existed in the database.

Link Demo: PRO Version

Link to PRO version: Download PRO Version
